googleReviewsBySlug.json.name: Sharon Hansen
googleReviewsBySlug.json.text: Had a leak on a main water inlet, water to home had to be turned off at Main Connect. I called Ingrams in the AM and by 1pm the issue was repaired. Chris was very thorough and completed the task quickly. Thank you!!
googleReviewsBySlug.json.title: Ingram Plumbing

googleReviewsBySlug.json.name: Charles Jones
googleReviewsBySlug.json.text: Great job by a well trained crew
googleReviewsBySlug.json.title: Ingram Plumbing

googleReviewsBySlug.json.name: Jordan Brown
googleReviewsBySlug.json.text: In the Arby's parking lot one of the  drivers was about 15 to 20 ft behind other cars holding up the line . Us not knowing if he was in line or not went in front of him . He got mad and started cussing at us and flipping us off . So based off that experience alone I wouldn't recommend this company
googleReviewsBySlug.json.title: Ingram Plumbing

googleReviewsBySlug.json.name: Judd McWain
googleReviewsBySlug.json.text: Jake and his team did a amazing job!!  Very fast response. Treated my house like there own. I would highly recommend them.
googleReviewsBySlug.json.responseFromOwnerText: Thank you! We appreciate you as a customer!
googleReviewsBySlug.json.title: Ingram Plumbing

plumberResearchFull.json:
### Business Information:

- **Alabama Business Registration/License Details**:
  Ingram Plumbing, LLC is registered with the State of Alabama and must comply with the licensing requirements set by the Alabama Plumbers & Gas Fitters Examining Board. The business is required to have a Principal Master designee, and all employees must be certified or registered with the board[1][4].

- **Physical Location and Service Areas**:
  Ingram Plumbing is located at 50 Jacintoport Ave, Saraland, AL 36571. The company serves the Saraland area and covers both commercial and residential sectors[2][3].

- **Hours and Payment Methods**:
  There is no specific information available on the business hours or payment methods for Ingram Plumbing. However, it is common for plumbing services to offer various payment methods, including credit cards and checks.

- **Years in Operation**:
  The BBB file for Ingram Plumbing, LLC was opened on May 4, 2021, indicating that the business has been operational for at least a few years[3].

### Services & Specialties:

- **Types of Services Offered**:
  Ingram Plumbing offers a wide range of services including:
  - Commercial and Residential Services
  - Preventive Maintenance
  - Water Heater Repairs and New Installations
  - Tankless Water Heaters
  - Manabloc Systems
  - Home Remodels
  - Outdoor Showers
  - Leak Repairs
  - Toilet, Bath, Sink, Shower Repair and Replacement
  - Gas Lines for Outdoor Grills, Heaters, and Pools
  - Gas Lines for New Appliances
  - Water Filtration Systems
  - Grinder Pump Services
  - Drain Cleaning
  - After Hours Emergency Services[5].

- **Service Areas Covered**:
  The company serves the Saraland area, covering both commercial and residential properties[2][3].

- **Emergency Service Availability**:
  Ingram Plumbing offers after-hours emergency services, indicating that they are available to handle urgent plumbing issues outside regular business hours[5].

- **Prices or Rates**:
  There is no specific information available on the prices or rates charged by Ingram Plumbing. This information is typically provided upon request or during the service quote process.

### Customer Reviews & Reputation:

- **Review Summaries with Specific Examples**:
  Ingram Plumbing has a rating of 4 based on 4 reviews, but the specific details of these reviews are not provided in the available sources. However, the overall rating suggests a generally positive customer experience.

- **BBB Rating and Status**:
  Ingram Plumbing, LLC is not BBB accredited. Despite this, the business has an A+ BBB rating, which is calculated based on various factors including complaint history, type of business, and overall customer feedback[3].

- **Common Customer Feedback Themes**:
  Without specific review content, it's challenging to identify common themes. However, the positive rating suggests that customers are generally satisfied with the services provided.

- **Response to Reviews**:
  There is no information available on how Ingram Plumbing responds to customer reviews.

### Owner & Staff:

- **Owner/Management Information**:
  The owner of Ingram Plumbing, LLC is Mr. Jake Ingram. He is also listed as the primary contact for customer inquiries[3].

- **Staff Qualifications**:
  While specific staff qualifications are not detailed, the business must adhere to the Alabama Plumbers & Gas Fitters Examining Board's requirements, which include having certified or registered employees, including journeyman and master plumbers[1][4].

- **Professional Certifications**:
  The Principal Master designee for Ingram Plumbing must hold the necessary certifications and licenses required by the Alabama Plumbers & Gas Fitters Examining Board. However, specific certifications for individual staff members are not provided[1][4].
aboutUs: Ingram Plumbing is a trusted local plumbing company serving the Saraland area with a wide range of commercial and residential services. Our team of certified professionals specializes in everything from preventive maintenance and water heater installations to complex remodeling projects and emergency repairs. With a focus on expertise and quality workmanship, we offer unique solutions like Manabloc systems, outdoor showers, and water filtration systems to meet your specific needs.

whyChooseUs.mainPitch: Experience the peace of mind that comes with choosing a fully licensed and insured plumbing company committed to delivering exceptional service and long-lasting solutions.
sellingPoints: Comprehensive expertise backed by rigorous training and certifications from the Alabama Plumbers & Gas Fitters Examining Board.
Prompt emergency services available 24/7 to quickly resolve urgent plumbing issues and minimize disruptions.
Tailored solutions designed to meet the unique needs of your commercial or residential property, from gas line installations to grinder pump services.
